title: Differences in students' school motivation: A latent class modelling approach
authors: H Korpershoek, H Kuyper, G van der Werf - Social Psychology of  …
excerpt: Abstract In this study, we investigated the school motivation of 7,257 9th grade students in 80 secondary schools across the Netherlands. Using a multiple goal perspective, four motivation dimensions were included: performance, mastery, extrinsic, and social  ...
